snippet: SIVASANKAR--Chengaleth, 1923 - 2016. United Nations Official. Siva died at his home in New York on March 30 after a long illness. He was most proud that all his life career was in the international civil service. He took an oath of loyalty to the UN at the age of twenty three and retired thirty-eight years later. He fully believed in the ideals of the UN and his oath was precious. He is survived by his wife, Dr. Mano Sivasankar. They have been married for nearly 60 years. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SIVASANKAR--Chengaleth, 1923 - 2016. United Nations Official. Siva died at his home in New York on March 30 after a long illness. He was most proud that all his life career was in the international civil service. He took an oath of loyalty to the UN at the age of twenty three and retired thirty-eight years later. He fully believed in the ideals of the UN and his oath was precious. He is survived by his wife, Dr. Mano Sivasankar. They have been married for nearly 60 years. 1/3
